data.text: Thank you for a lovely stay! The hotel room was spacious and clean and modern, the staff is very welcomming and helpfull, the food is good and the pool area is lovely both winter (even though the suns disappears early afternoon), spring, summer (chilled pool is a must - so nice) and fall. Special thanks to Kishwor and Samjhana for making me feel at home in my room.
data.title: Home at Hyatt

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear 247kajat,

Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for taking the time to share your great review! 

We are delighted to know that you enjoyed your stay as well as the service and facilities provided by our team.

Feedback received from guests such as you are huge motivation to our team. I will definitely share your comments with them.

We look forward to welcoming you again soon! 

Warm regards,
Bhishmaraj Singh
General Manager
owner_response.author: Bhishmaraj Singh

data.text: It was great  staying at the property, the staff was very friendly, special thanks to Mr. Ali who let us extend our check as our flight was delayed, also Mr Kishore and  Samjhana who for keeping our apartment very clean and attending to us whenever required.
data.title: Great experience,

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear  138yogeshs,

Thank you for sharing your great feedback further to your recent visit with us.

I am delighted to know that you enjoyed your stay and the service provided by our team.

We work very hard to create a wonderful hotel experience and your comments encourage us to be the best we can be. I will be happy to share your review with all our colleagues who took a great care of you.

It would be our pleasure to have your return soon.

Warm regards,
Bhishmaraj Singh
General Manager
owner_response.author: Bhishmaraj Singh

data.text:
NICE HOTEL with GOOD  SERVICE.

 We stayed in three hotels in 3 locations during our 11 day stay in Dubai. 	This hotel turned out to be the best. 

The staff at the front desk were friendly and helpful.
We stayed in room 124 which was a large. 
The only small complaint was that the fridge did not work efficiently. 

There are supermarkets within a 10 min walk from the hotel, otherwise there did not seem much to see or do in this area.
data.title: NICE HOTEL with GOOD  SERVICE.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear PPPEssexEngland,

Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for taking the time to share your positive review. 

We are delighted to know that you enjoyed your stay, and we were able to deliver to you the Hyatt Hospitality we proud ourselves on. 

I am further glad to read your kind comments about our colleagues.

We also thank you for your recommendation. We will sincerely take your comment into account and do our best to improve our services. 

The team and I look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Warm regards,
Bhishmaraj Singh,
General Manager
owner_response.author: Bhishmaraj Singh

data.text: Friendly staff.  My daughter loved the man in the dining room with a turban whose name I forget.  He was very child friendly.  The housekeeper was also very friendly and made sure we had a fresh bottle of water every day.  He also decorated the children's beds with balloons on the last day.  Thank you Devyaiu nagesh
data.title: child friendly, friendly staff

data.text: If you want to know what a true 4 star hotel is stay in this hotel. It was super clean and elegant. I honestly thought it was a 5 star hotel until I saw the sign. The price was not bad at all. I paid $71 inclusive breakfast and taxes. You can’t beat that for month of March. I encourage everyone to stay there. Very hospitable clean cheap. I would give them 6 stars if I could
data.title: Best 4-star place in Jumaira
